M

Mage - Class in sprites
Mage is a child of Enemy with attributes and unique images.
Mage(int, int, Map<GameVariables.State, List<BufferedImage>>, int[], int, BufferedImage) - Constructor for class sprites.Mage
Create a Mage, which should be done through a MageFactory.
mageCreator - Variable in class chunks.ChunkManager
Used to make mage enemies.
MageFactory - Class in sprites
MageFactory will load the Mage images and create Mage instances using the createEnemy function.
MageFactory() - Constructor for class sprites.MageFactory
Creates a new mage factory.

move() - Method in class sprites.Enemy
Move decides how the enemy should move based on the player position and current position, if the enemy can see the player, and if the enemy has gotten hit or not.
